remarks: A complex function with derivative bounded by ` M ` on an open ball is Lipschitz continuous with Lipschitz constant equal to ` M ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Mar-2015.)
statement:
dvlipcn.x $e |- ( ph -> X C_ CC ) $.
dvlipcn.f $e |- ( ph -> F : X --> CC ) $.
dvlipcn.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
dvlipcn.r $e |- ( ph -> R e. RR* ) $.
dvlipcn.b $e |- B = ( A ( ball ` ( abs o. - ) ) R ) $.
dvlipcn.d $e |- ( ph -> B C_ dom ( CC _D F ) ) $.
dvlipcn.m $e |- ( ph -> M e. RR ) $.
dvlipcn.l $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. B ) -> ( abs ` ( ( CC _D F ) ` x ) ) <_ M ) $.
dvlipcn $p |- ( ( ph /\ ( Y e. B /\ Z e. B ) ) -> ( abs ` ( ( F ` Y ) - ( F ` Z ) ) ) <_ ( M x. ( abs ` ( Y - Z ) ) ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
$d M x $.
$d ph x $.
